Text:
I've been trying to add this torrent to my transmission daemon without success. I tried downloading it from hexagone too.
It doesn't add it.
Any ideas? Thanks.
Don't use transmission. I recommend uTorrent.

Thanks for your reply. Downloading via utorrent even though i love controlling my transmission-daemon via its web interface.
Thanks for all your great uploads. I'm a fan of the HD group @ Hexagon.
